workItems.title: Floating bug button on every page
workItems.description: Persistent floating button in bottom-right corner of all TeamHQ pages (except index.html). Bug icon, visually distinct but not distracting. Opens reporter panel as popover/drawer. Keyboard shortcut Cmd/Ctrl+Shift+B. Auto-captures screenshot on open.

workItems.title: Voice note recording
workItems.description: Record button in reporter panel using MediaRecorder API. Visual recording indicator (pulsing dot/timer). 30-second cap with warning at 25s and auto-stop. Re-record support. Graceful microphone permission denial handling. Text input fallback if MediaRecorder unavailable.

workItems.title: AI transcription of voice notes
workItems.description: Auto-transcribe after recording stops. Loading state during transcription. Editable text area for transcription output. Manual typing fallback if no recording. Error/timeout handling (15s 'still working', 30s fallback to manual).

workItems.title: Submit bug report to task tracker
workItems.description: Submit creates work item with type 'bug', auto-generated title from transcription, full description, status 'planned', priority 'medium'. Metadata: pageUrl, screenshotPath, timestamp, userAgent. Screenshot saved to data/bug-screenshots/. Toast confirmation with link on success. POST /api/bug-reports endpoint. Schema changes: add type and metadata fields to WorkItem.

workItems.title: Screenshot preview and retake
workItems.description: Auto-captured screenshot displayed as thumbnail in reporter panel. Click thumbnail for larger preview. Retake button to re-capture. Shimmer placeholder during capture. 'Screenshot unavailable' with Retry on failure. No annotation tools in v1.
